name: Lost Isle (Coffeephilic)
description:
Navigate your way through a collection of mazes and puzzles in VR.  Check back from time to time, as I'm adding new levels semi-regularly.

This game was tested on the Oculus Quest 2, and should work on other OpenXR  compatible devices.

Upcoming features:

  • Save files
  • Music and SFX
  • Inventory system
  • And of course more levels
